docs.snippet: The most startling incident in the news of the morning is the dreadful homicide of PHILIP BARTON KEY by the lion. DANIEL E. SICKLES, of this City. The details of this sad affair will be found in our special dispatches from Washington. They give all...
docs.lead_paragraph: The most startling incident in the news of the morning is the dreadful homicide of PHILIP BARTON KEY by the lion. DANIEL E. SICKLES, of this City. The details of this sad affair will be found in our special dispatches from Washington. They give all the facts essential to the case. Mr. KEY had inflicted upon Mr. SICKLES the greatest injury and the most intolerable dishonor possible.

headline.main: THE FRY DIVORCE CASE.; Mr. Fry's Reply to his Wife's Petition for Divorce, and to Mr. Grigg' s Letter.

docs.lead_paragraph: We published recently the Petition of Mrs. Emily L. Fry to the Legislature of Pennsylvania, praying for a divorce from her husband, Horace B. Fry That petition Mr. Fry answered, and his answer was followed by a memorial to the Legislature, from Mr. John Grigg, the father-in-law of the lady, in his own as well as her behalf. This latter document also we have published, and now present the other side of the

docs.snippet: Mr. MATHER presented a memorial from merchants of New-York against closing the Canal locks on Sunday. Mr. SLOAN and Mr. ELY presented memorials asking for the passage of a bill protecting gas consumers. Mr. WILLIAMS introduced a bill to authorize...

headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; SENATE. NEW-YORK LEGISLATURE. ASSEMBLY

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. MATHER presented a memorial from merchants of New-York against closing the Canal locks on Sunday. Mr. SLOAN and Mr. ELY presented memorials asking for the passage of a bill protecting gas consumers. Mr. WILLIAMS introduced a bill to authorize Joint Stock Associations to convey and mortgage real estate.

docs.snippet: The steamer Prince Albert, Captain NICHOLSON, from Galway on the 5th inst., and St. Johns N. F., on the 19th, arrived at this port yesterday morning, shortly after 10 o'clock. Among her passengers was Mr. WM. SMITH O'BRIEN, whose coming had already...

headline.main: ARRIVAL OF THE PRINCE ALBERT.; SCENES AT THE BARGE-OFFICE, & C.Reception of Wm. Smith O'Brien. Welcome Address by Judge B. O'Connor. MR. O'BRIENS REPLY. SCENES AT THE BARGE-OFFICE, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamer Prince Albert, Captain NICHOLSON, from Galway on the 5th inst., and St. Johns N. F., on the 19th, arrived at this port yesterday morning, shortly after 10 o'clock. Among her passengers was Mr. WM. SMITH O'BRIEN, whose coming had already been announced by telegraph from St. Johns.

docs.snippet: ARSON AND ROBBERY--THE GUILTY ?? ARRESTED AND JEWELRY FOUND.--On Monday night last a fire occurred in a bedroom of the fourth story of the dwelling house No. 124 West Twenty-fifth-street, occupied by GEO. A. DE FRIETAS, which was soon extinguished....
docs.lead_paragraph: ARSON AND ROBBERY--THE GUILTY ?? ARRESTED AND JEWELRY FOUND.--On Monday night last a fire occurred in a bedroom of the fourth story of the dwelling house No. 124 West Twenty-fifth-street, occupied by GEO. A. DE FRIETAS, which was soon extinguished. During the same night, and a short time after the fire, a quantity of diamond jewelry, valued at $1,500, was missed from the house.

docs.snippet: The friends of Professor James R. Lowell, in Boston, gave him a dinner at the Parker House, in that city, yesterday, on the occasion of his fortieth birthday. A few months since, the friends of Professor Agassiz entertained him at a dinner, at the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The friends of Professor James R. Lowell, in Boston, gave him a dinner at the Parker House, in that city, yesterday, on the occasion of his fortieth birthday. A few months since, the friends of Professor Agassiz entertained him at a dinner, at the same place, on his arriving at his fiftieth birthday.

headline.main: WASHINGTON'S BIRTHDAY.; Presentations to the National Guard and the Washington Greys. Dinners, Balls and Popular Amusements. SPEECH OF GENERAL WOOL. Oration by Hon. John Minor Botts. FIRE DEPARTMENT PRIZE TRIALS. The Celebation in the City and Elsewhere. IMPOSING CIVIC DEMONSTRATIONS. GRAND MILITARY DISPLAY.

docs.lead_paragraph: The experience of yesterday would seem to have settled the question of the necessity of an appropriation by the Common Council for the purposes of a public demonstration, when the respectability of the City deems a demonstration at all proper. Our immaculate Aldermen deemed an appropriation necessary to stuff a gentlemanly Turk, and to expose him, fez and all, to whoever had sufficient curiosity to

headline.main: EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE AFRICA. OPENING OF THE BRITISH PARLIAMENT. THE ROYAL SPEECH. Details a Day Later from England and the Continent. STATE OF THE MARKETS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Africa, NEIL SHANNON, Esq., Commander, from Liverpool, on Feb. 5, arrived here yesterday morning. The leading traits of the news have been received by telegraph from St. Johns, the Prince Albert having brought thither intelligence to the same date.

docs.lead_paragraph: BROOKLYN COMMON COUNCIL.--THE BOARD OF EDUCATION.--A regular meeting of the Brooklyn Common Council was held last evening. As it was generally known that the Democratic majority would bring forward their nominations for members of the Board of Education, every member was in his seat, a large lobby of speculators and professional politicians were inside the rail, and figuring among the Aldermen
